title: Sentimental Journey Orchestral Collection
description: A collection of seventeen beautiful and sentimental tracks for a variety of instrumental combinations from tender and intimate piano to vast and glorious orchestral cinematic tracks.
longDescription:
A collection of seventeen beautiful and sentimental tracks for a variety of instrumental combinations from tender and intimate piano to vast and glorious orchestral cinematic tracks.


Sampler Preview of the music


Seventeen Tracks Included:

1. Beautiful Atmospheric Ambient Piano 2:34

2. Beautiful Cinematic Moment 1:47

3. Beautiful Garden 2:08

4. Beautiful Hope 1:15

5. Emotional Harp and Strings 1:04

6. Idealistic 2:20

7. In Loving Memory 2:10

8. Inspiring Background Mood 1:07

9. Inspiring Melancholy 2:09

10. Longing for Love 2:26

11. Piano Love Song 2:08

12. Piano Tenderness 2:21

13. Sad but Hopeful 3:06

14. Sad Surging Strings 0:45

15. Sentimental Ambient Piano 2:20

16. Tearful Interlude 0:41

17. Thoughtful and Hopeful 2:44
technicalDetails:
